layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF]
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 784x144 [border: (3px solid #008000)]
        LayoutBlockFlow {CAPTION} at (0,0) size 784x24 [border: (3px solid #FFA500)]
          LayoutText {#text} at (354,3) size 76x18
            text run at (354,3) width 76: "caption text"
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (3,27) size 778x114
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 778x110
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 774x110 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 752x108
                text run at (1,1) width 752: "table text which should wrap table text which should wrap table text which should wrap table text which should wrap"
                text run at (1,19) width 752: "table text which should wrap table text which should wrap table text which should wrap table text which should wrap"
                text run at (1,37) width 752: "table text which should wrap table text which should wrap table text which should wrap table text which should wrap"

                text run at (1,91) width 185: "table text which should wrap"
